# PR Roaster - Cyberpunk Terminal

A Next.js 14 project with Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, and Shadcn/UI.

## Project Details
- **Theme**: Cyberpunk Terminal
- **Background**: Deep charcoal (#0a0a0a)
- **Accent**: Neon red
- **Components**: Shadcn/UI with custom styling

## Development
- Run `npm run dev` to start the development server
- The landing page features a terminal-style PR link input
